name: Bring Your Camera
description:
This game was a collaboration between Lisa Brown and Jason VandenBerghe for a small game jam (and an excuse for Lisa to learn RenPy).

The constraints were that Lisa could ONLY use art that was already made for Inktober (2015 and 2016). Lisa figured out a rough semblance of structure from the images she had to work with, then handed it off to Jason, who went through and made it all make sense with words.

Music

Camera Sound Effect - http://www.freesound.org/people/JanKoehl/sounds/72...
